name: Fathers and Fatherhood
description:
This is my story about raising six sons in a home where I was seeking to be a loving father and a faithful friend and it has been written in the hope of engaging men in serious consideration and conversation about Fathers and Fatherhood. 

The book includes six personal chapters contributed by each of my sons. 

For multiple copies and alternative payment methods please email: iankparker@hotmail.com
